author: hwright
msg: Followup to r38365, setting more svn:eol-style properties on files I missed.

author: hwright
msg: Set the svn:eol-style property to native on some additional text files.
I know these file are primarily used on Windows, but having the eol-style
property set prevents the rest of the world from getting spurious ^M characters

author: arfrever
msg: is used to control enabling of using of -Wl,--no-undefined flag.

attempting to manually catch and examine an error.
